revised_title: Ireland's Antiquities and Natural History: Observations and Discoveries by Edw. Lhwyd
tldr: In this letter, Edw. Lhwyd shares his observations and discoveries during his travels through Ireland, including the exploration of a cave at New Grange, the Giants Causeway, and various other historical and natural sites. He also discusses Irish inscriptions, ancient manuscripts, and local flora and fauna.
